alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 2:37AM EST until January 10 at 11:45PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Still River at Brookfield. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The river begins to flood roads and parking lots. At 16.0 feet, Water gets into some buildings near the river. Many roads closed and parking lots flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 13.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.6 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Still River Brookfield Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Wed 1 am: 13.1 Forecast: Wed 7 am 15.3 Wed 1 pm 13.6 Wed 7 pm 11.6 &&
